name: Jabi Lake Park
description: A scenic waterfront park perfect for picnics, paddle boating, and evening strolls with great views of the city.

name: Millennium Park
description: A beautifully landscaped urban park featuring winding paths, public art installations, and shaded lawns ideal for family outings.

name: Silverbird Galleria
address: Ahmadu Bello Way, Central Business District
description: A lively entertainment and shopping complex with cinemas, eateries, and boutique stores — great for a day of culture and fun.

name: Arts & Culture Hub (ARTX)
description: A creative space showcasing local artists, rotating exhibitions, workshops, and pop-up markets celebrating Nigerian craft and design.

name: Garki International Market
description: A diverse international market offering imported goods, local crafts, specialty foods, and a lively multicultural atmosphere. Great for unique finds and global flavors.

name: National Mosque Gardens
description: Well-maintained gardens surrounding the iconic National Mosque, offering peaceful spots for reflection and photography.

name: The Greenbelt
description: A community green space with jogging trails, weekend markets, and casual cafés — a favorite among locals for weekend relaxation.

name: Viewpoint at Asokoro
description: A quiet hilltop viewpoint offering panoramic vistas of Abuja's skyline — perfect for sunrise or sunset visits.
